name: Phantom Fortress Enterblathnir
text:
2 Level 9 monsters
Once per turn: You can detach 1 Xyz Material from this card, then activate 1 of these effects;
â—? Banish 1 card your opponent controls.
â—? Banish 1 random card from your opponent's hand.
â—? Banish 1 card from your opponent's Graveyard.
â—? Banish the top card of your opponent's Deck, face-up.
